2025-08-28ISEDFinancial Administration ActFirm KPMG LLP of Montréal, Quebec, as Auditor of the Business development Bank of Canada ** Appointment **Order appointing the firm KPMG LLP of Montréal, Quebec, as Auditor of the Business Development Bank of Canada for the fiscal year commencing April 1, 2025.N/A
subject: Firm KPMG LLP of Montréal, Quebec, as Auditor of the Business development Bank of Canada ** Appointment **
precis: Order appointing the firm KPMG LLP of Montréal, Quebec, as Auditor of the Business Development Bank of Canada for the fiscal year commencing April 1, 2025.
